Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Crimden Dene, Blackhall, County Durham Prizes - 1st £7.10s., 2nd £3.10s., 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest - 1st(£1) Swan Hunter, 2nd(10s.) Thornley Colliery. Hymn tune contest - 1st(15s.) Swan Hunter, 2nd(10s.) Easington Colliery.
